title: Tesla Inc. stock rises Thursday, still underperforms market
text:
Shares of Tesla Inc. 
        TSLA,
        -2.25%
       rallied 1.20% to $178.65 Thursday, on what proved to be an all-around great trading session for the stock market, with the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        -0.12%
       rising 1.51% to 16,273.38 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 0.34% to 38,791.35. The stock's rise snapped a three-day losing streak. Tesla Inc. closed $120.64 below its 52-week high ($299.29), which the company achieved on July 19th. Trading volume (101.4 M) remained 4.8 million below its 50-day average volume of 106.2 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. The S&P 500 is up almost 50% since October 2022.
